import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Card, Row, Col, InputGroup, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const MovieOne = ({ data }) => { const content = data.list[0].page["content-items"]["content"]; const [movies, setMovies] = useState([]); const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); const pagetitle = data.list[0].page.title const searchMovie = (e) => setSearch(e.target.value.toLowerCase()) useEffect(() => { setMovies(content.filter(team => team.name.toLowerCase().includes(search))) }, [search]) return (

{pagetitle}

 : movies.map((items, index) => { return ( {items.name} ) })} ) } console.warn = () => { } export default MovieOne
